lines.text: You hear a heavy smashing of wood, some more barks and gibbering echoing around the way. You can see now flames curling up to the top of the building that you're all right next to, before the small wall that bisects the entryway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a shield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I start one of my swords on the back of my neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are sitting ducks here. What do we do, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all on the other side of a wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go towards the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To give you perspective now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. This'll help. Hey side note: where's my fucking wine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you leave it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You mean your water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you leave it outside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it gone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's just on the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Oh my gosh. Where are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so cool. Look at that flame on the side of the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are all right over this side area, corner. Arrange yourself as you feel you wish to be. Over there on the far end of the village.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow. What a cool map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wish to, you can place yourselves where you wish or show me where you want them to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would be pressed against the wall of that house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to give you Blessing of the Trickster just in case you want to stealth because you're squishy, yo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I have advantage on stealth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be with Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The enemies are just all over that direction, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still hear them barking and giving orders next to each other (rabid barking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away are the ones on the roof? How long is the distance from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? At this distance it's hard to say. I'd say probably in the neighborhood of about 70 to 80 feet from you. You guys, I would like, if you are trying to stay out of sight, make a stealth check, please. Those of you with a point of exhaustion, you have disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So revealing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, I'm exhausted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. As a group, for the moment you guys haven't drawn their attention. You're still right next to where there are crownsguard who are in the process of a firefight with whatever is in this vicinity of the city. However, you may or may not make it through, for the moment, unseen. You're not certain how many there are. But you can hear a lot of yipping and growling right around this large, two-story building that is currently engulfed in flames.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an idea. We need to move away from here, right, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do. We have to use the cover of the buildings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I think I can do something that would make them fire many of their arrows at something, but not us. Should I do that and then as soon as they fire their arrows we can run?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Diversions are absolutely--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Diversions! That's what it's called, it's a diversion. All right, may I move, is that a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may, you're stealthed currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take out a bit of fleece, and repeating the words and doing the hand gestures that I've been taught and tracing the image of a creature on the fleece, I will make a Silent Image of the guard who told us 30 gold a gnoll. I'm going to have the image of that guard dash across, slowly, dash across this alleyway. Like that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe amble more than dash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, not dash, just walk in a way that he could be easily shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting point of order, you're not too certain of the gender of this individual, kind of fluid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great, that long-haired guard individual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're finishing drawing your blade across your back, what normally would be cold energy suddenly flickers into this beacon of bright white light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something clicks in your mind and you're like, "Oh, I know you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm preparing. How close am I to this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This entity would be here now. It would have just left out into that section there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Vicious Mockery at it, really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I invoke Duplicity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. I'm giving you all one round preparation before we roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is a fight. So anything you want to do now, do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mutter a few words and my form starts to blink in and out of view. There is another Caleb next to me and another Caleb next to me. Shifting, blinking, flashing back and forth and it's hard to see where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is that concentration?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I'm going to put a concentration marker on you just so we remember it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I also, knowing that we're probably going to be up close, danger close, I'm going to cast Armor of Agathys on myself. You see a spectral frost start to harden around my armor in a shimmering light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Vicious Mockery. I'm going to look at him with my eyes glowing, and my sword glowing, and in Infernal say, (rasping) The light comes to blind your eyes and burn your flesh. Yeah, 1d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 13 minus three. I believe it's wisdom, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure that's a ten and that does not make your DC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yup, so he takes three psychic damage and he has disadvantage on his next attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action-- yeah, fuck it, let's go for it-- I'm going to activate both swords.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drag the other edge of your blade--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should I? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've taken a total of six damage and your max HP is down by six. But you have currently the new invoked Rite on each blade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To say a little pray to the Traveler, and I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may do that. Where are you going to cast it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast it right above this zombie gnoll. It's going to be in the shape of a giant lollipop. Like a bludgeoning lollipop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as this flash of purplish energy suddenly apparates into the air. This thick-like wooden handle that is jammed into a massive, bludgeoning, solid piece of sugary goodness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The old fashioned swirly kind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you can make an attack with that as soon as it comes out. Make a melee spell attack, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, seven. Seven radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven radiant damage, nice. As it strikes down, wham! From the creature, already watching its bones and its form shakes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, oh wait, oh wait, I was looking at the wrong spell, hold on. Oh, 1d8 plus three! Seven plus three-- Ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Oh, that'll be enough. You watch as it pulls back with the Infernal shouting of Mollymauk causing it to prepare itself for a lunge. As it gets low, its jaw snapping open, you watch as bits of its skin fall onto the ground as it does so (snarl). And right before it leaps, (wham) it just smashes it into the ground and its bones go flying and scattering in every which direction.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that one of the were-thingies? Damn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That ear is mine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Beau, what are you doing? You all have one round of prep. Right now, you've gone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast a spell. Can I also move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as the arrows flew by, I'm going to dash across the alley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to send my duplicate after her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're running that way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. As far as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And you send your duplicate over there as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. And Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm also going to use my speed to dash across. I can move 40. Can I peek into this window and see if I can see anything in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Easy to see in this perspective. You glance inside--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealthily?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you glance inside, you can just barely see around the corner. The place is tossed. It is shattered and ruined. It looks like it was once the interior of a small tavern of some kind, but the kitchen is wrecked and you can see two of these gnolls are in the process of grabbing large sacks out of the kitchen and pulling them out through the front door on the opposite side of the building.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay. I turn to Nott. I go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at two unicorns inside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gnolls!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're inside the--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you all now to roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the second one of the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, is this an ability check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, so these are with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, scheiß.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was worse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (German accent) That was worse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was already bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Initiative is an ability?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are attack rolls?

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Did I already ask that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Don't worry, though; I touched all your dice, so they're going to roll great tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks. Thanks, Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He may have licked a couple of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you lick this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20, anybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put it back over here. I'm going to try it. Maybe it'll roll really well with your spit on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a very pretty die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so pretty, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. All righty. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine. Oh, nope, never mind, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, guys. Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ten to five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that order.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want them to get a little closer anyway. They're all far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all part of the plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to go great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, then Jester. Then Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, all together at last.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so. Top of the round, as some of this has happened. The one gnoll skeletal form has shattered onto the ground. Some of the other gnolls begin to look over in that direction, and see a few of you over by the guards now, standing up and darting over the way. They're preparing for some sort of... whatever's coming. But first of the round is you, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh!?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you want to take these guys? You ready for this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (panicked stuttering) I'm going to drink from my flask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get ready. I want them to come to this window, okay? I'm going to go (whistles) through the window. Try and get their attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a performance check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The whistle has a bit of volume to it. Unfortunately, with the sound of all the breaking of furniture, them all growling at each other, and the general screams in the vicinity, it's lost in the chaos. It's not necessarily a quiet atmosphere to draw a guard's attention. The gnolls don't seem to care much for a whistle around the window. They're more focused on grabbing and running out the front, other way, with whatever they're taking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that my action or a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let that be like a bonus action, we'll say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you were waiting for something to happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mercer-ful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. Going in! I jump through the window, and before one of them leaves, I'm going to crack them with the staff right over the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With a 40-foot movement, that brings you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go in through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. As you go through the window, because they've mostly shifted into the other room now; that's where you see them moving. They're not in the room that's closest to you, so you go jump through the window, over the mass, make your way through the living room, and you watch as they're exiting the door. You get all the way through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it was much closer than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. But you do manage to make it all the way to this door there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! They're going out the back door. I thought they were going out that way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that still what you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's bad disadvantage. Fog of war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, here's what you do. As you rush through to go after them, as they're fleeing out the other side, you come to the doorway and you can see there's one gnoll right in front of you that hasn't noticed you rushing behind it. It's currently throwing a corpse of one of the villagers onto a cart that's sitting right outside of that door. That cart, which is piled up with other corpses, and bags, and whatever things they were robbing from the inside of this building that they've thrown onto this cart. You can now see there's four gnolls that are gathered around it in the process of throwing things onto it, and it looks like they're getting ready to start pushing it. They haven't noticed your arrival, as you've just darted into the doorway. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to double ba-- Ah, I can't move anymore, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was your move to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point and do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as your action you can just go into it without having to spend a ki point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ki point allows you to do it as a bonus action, but you can just do it as an action any time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Great, I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just go into the dodge action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll just hold back and wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you're holding back in the doorway, and you're ready to use the door to help defend you if it needs to. Okay, that ends Beau's turn. It's now their turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, already? Oh god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is what was coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They rolled really high in the initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are we calling these things?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Gnolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: G-N-O-L-L.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I was going to still be a lot closer to Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) G-N-O-L-L.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) K-N-O-L-L

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Visibly off to the side, there is...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: N-O-L-L?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's going to be two of them firing their bow-- Actually, no, three, because they watched you come out. There's three of them that are going to be firing their bows at Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau, bow, Beau, and bow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bobobo-bo bo-bobo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all have disadvantage on the attack, however.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in Patient Defense; she's going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's the only thing it can visually see. It's going to stay behind the wall. That's three attacks at disadvantage against Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they all have disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I did Patient Defense?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one with a longbow, that's a 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next one, from this guy up here--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately go: whoops.

lines.name: MATT

They're getting around and preparing for the next round to shoot a volley.

As this gnoll is in the process of slamming through the front doorway, the doorway has been bashed inward on each side and Beau is in the process of dodging and weaving and getting out of the way. You find one opening and fire your crossbow bolt. It goes through the window, through the doorway bisecting the two different rooms and straight under the clavicle near the heart section of it. As it pierces in, (screams) and it coughs up a bunch of blood onto the front of its hide armor. It's not dead, but it's pretty hurt. That was a pretty nasty blow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Movement, I will use to climb up into the second floor window. That's not me. The one next to your right. There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams)

lines.text: Trying to avert your gaze, the heat is pressing into you. There's a table that's on fire, most of the roof has been burned away. There's beams that have fallen. You're like, "This was a "bad idea!"

lines.name: MATT

Your boots are on fire, and you're having to pat them out real fast. You suffer five points of fire damage getting across the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you are in an area where it seems it's just embers, and most of the flame is catching behind you for the moment. You get the sense that it might begin to spread in the next minute or so, but at this point, you're not immediately in the threat of flame and you have a look down into the entirety of the courtyard with a little bit of cover. In fact, it would be considered half cover up in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half cover. I'm done. Hey, look at that, it's me in the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you can see the skeletal gnolls that are out there all at once turn and begin shambling forward. There's one this way that begins to run up and take a swing at your duplicitous form, before striking out with no effect. This one spins and comes up into Beau and then there's one that emerges from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay, we learn what the new abilities do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I just looked it up and I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of the doorway here, another one of them bursts through and runs to the back and sees the direction where Jester is in the process of glancing over to the side.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It uses its action to charge up into combat with you. It can't actually make an attack this turn, but it's right up to you. Its gaping, vacuous skull, open sockets, trying to bear down on you. That's going to end their go, except for the one that's striking at you, Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's one on the roof still, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be, with disadvantage, 17 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hit. It bites out towards you with its broken toothy jaws and you suffer six points of piercing damage as the jaws clamp down on your forearm and you're like "Oh god!" It's pushing now to try to find the space next to the larger gnoll and they're both currently blocking the doorway from your escape.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm doing the animal control thing and be like: No, no, bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, by the way, top of the round. Beau, your go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My go, okay. Let me put these hit points in. Apply changes.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 120 feet.

lines.text: Oh shit. But you can leave her out in the open.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: The one that just bit you? All right, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it. That's 11.

lines.text: 11? 11 doesn't hit unfortunately. Lot of whiffing on both sides when it comes around Beau, but as you attempt to strike out with the elbow, it does strike its skull, and its jaw unhinges and snaps it back into place.

lines.text: Yep.

lines.text: Sure!

lines.text: Before we do anything, the one that's right next to the guy on the wall, what do you want it to do?

lines.text: Melee, so if he has a weapon or anything, hit him. If not, just knock him the fuck off the roof.

lines.text: He has a spear or you can make a shove, up to you.

lines.text: All right, so the spear attack, it's going to, as it climbs to the top and lunges out with its arm. Go ahead and make an attack roll for me.
