lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 definitely hits. Go ahead and roll 1d6 damage plus two. Two hands technically, so that would be 1d8. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's much better. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to figure out what exactly happened. As it does so, it's going to attempt to shove it off the wall that just hit it. Make a roll for the athletics check of the other gnoll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Adding my modifier or its?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 plus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does suffer one point of falling damage. Molly, you watch as it tumbles and hits the dirt next to you and it's like (groans). You watch as this mystical crown of weird iron horns are floating above its head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 11, misses. It actually hits the wall and embeds itself into the side of the door frame. The two attacking you, Nott-- You do have partial cover on these guys. Half cover will be plus two bonus to AC. The first one is going to be a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one is a natural two. The one that does hit you, you suffer nine points of piercing damage. A lot of nines tonight! As the arrow suddenly arcs upward and hits you right in the side of the jaw and carves through part of your neck that way before it exits out the other side. You have this big gash on the side. It doesn't quite hit the jugular, thankfully, but it is pretty messy as you are starting to bleed down the side of your neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't she harder to hit because she's so little?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These guys here continue to push forward that way and they're going to use their other action to push forward. This guy is going to go ahead and throw another body up onto this as the other one's pushing it. They don't get quite as far because one of them stopped pushing, but they're getting to the edge of the map. The one that's snarling there is watching them vanish behind. This guy around the edge is going to, let's see. Seeing you yelp up in the window, he's going to take a shot at you. Beau's currently being dealt with two of them and you're up in the flames right now. That is going to be a 15, which I do not believe hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this guy is going to turn and take a swing at Beau with a spear, two hands. That is a 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses. It swings out and you actually catch the spear off to the side and you're now in a strength tug of war with its own weapon as it's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My stick! Mine! Drop it! Bad! Do you want to play or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending their go, it goes to Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crown of Madness piece of shit. Can I go ahead and send, using my action to maintain it, can I send that stupid ass back up the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The damage may have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Knocked it out. No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So either you continue to maintain the spell, and then next turn it's still under your control, or you do whatever you want--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or you drop it because he's prone and Molly will get super advantage on hitting him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super advantage!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know what the crown is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck it, I'll drop it and I'll come into the street, down the way 30 feet. But I look like a gnoll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Concentration's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I still look like a gnoll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That will be my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, are you holding your action to do anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess, because I dropped it, I have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your action because you didn't maintain the spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my action, I'm going to cast Hexblade's Curse on that big son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it's a bonus action to do that, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you still have your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could even make it to get into his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my action, I will Eldritch Blast from where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, make the attack roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. Skadoosh. It's a 15 plus six, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing, 1d10. (counting) Sorry, I should've looked at this beforehand. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the other hand holding the suddenly appearing barnacle-studded blade, you unleash this blast of eldritch energy that slams into the center of the armor. You watch as the energy courses through all of the crevices between the scales that are overlapping. As it fades, you watch as this bit of steam and blood come out of its mouth, and it turns right to you, its head turning, it spits a cluster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yipping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that. That's your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as previously it just had this large pole on its back? It pulls it and brings it loose as you see a large two-handed glaive come swooping, which doesn't actually-- it can get to there and still hit you because of its reach. As it runs forward, it brings it down. It's going to multi-attack you twice with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one is going to be a 21 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 17 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's okay, I've got the armor. It deals damage when you hit me.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is eight points of slashing damage on the first hit. Wham! As the large polearm-- the axe-like hooked blade at the end of it. You can see the same spines that are on its armor are affixed to the edge of it. As it slams down towards you, the armor bursts, this cold energy that-- how much damage does he take?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got ten temporary hit points at second level, so he takes eight points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slick. Second strike? He rolled a one. That is going to be four points of slashing damage for the second strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So he'll take two points of cold damage and I'll take the other two points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have so many fun gadgets!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! He does get back his Incite Rampage. At which point, he's going to go ahead and glance over towards the gnoll that is-- hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The grassy gnoll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The grassy gnoll, yes. Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, yeah. The only one that they can currently see that's in melee range at the moment, because the wall's there, is going to be the one next to Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, really. Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks over to the one right in front of Beau and goes (growls and snarls) and it glances over its shoulder, and with renewed strength, pulls the spear free from your grasp and goes for another strike against you as a reaction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bad dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are engaged with you right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three? Two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's so wanted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be seven points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Apologies to my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that's going to end his turn and the guards back here are going to come forward and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, let's go this way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both going to fire at the one on the rooftop.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) And a miss and a miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one's a miss. Second one is a 16. That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an eight plus two so that's ten points of damage. Based on the Crown of Madness damage it took earlier, the spear's enough to finish it off. You watch as on the top, it goes and draws an arrow and pulls it back, looking down at you as you're down in the square. Then one of the guards pulls its crossbow and (shrieks) it stumbles back and falls dead on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without issue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not used to melee combat. This is so terrifying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get up in that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to get up in that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get a whole bunch of stank right in your face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulls out the heavy crossbow and fires and does 11 points of damage, which is enough to shatter the skeletal gnoll witherling. As it falls to the ground and breaks into a scattered pile of bone bits and dried gnoll flesh. That ends the guards' turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stab this thing that just fell right in front of me. Just going to stab it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is prone, so I believe you have advantage against it. Yep! With each attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Question about Rite of the Dawn, is it just plus three or is it just my wisdom or is it also a--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom bonus is against undead creatures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, this is not an undead creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not. There are undead creatures among the pack, but there are none there. It's just straight Rite damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if I hit? Thank you. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 unfortunately misses. The first strike--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you swing down onto the ground, it scrambles about and pulls its shield up just in time. Your blade catches the edge, embeds itself an inch into its rear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hit it with the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use your one blade to push the shield off to the side as it's still there, and trying to jam downward. Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Definitely hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on. Oh, thank God. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chanting) Level three! Level three!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage. You manage to jam underneath and hit it in the chest. It shrieks with pain and pushes the blade out of its body with a sheer flexing of its muscle. It begins to try and get up off the ground. It's hurt, but it's still standing or about to be standing in a moment. You can move if you'd like to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's right. I can break combat with it. It doesn't matter, right? At this point? Or does it get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does get an attack of opportunity, but it has disadvantage on him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way I can circle up onto the wall, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto the wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Get a little vantage on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to be able to hop on because I want to head that direction afterwards. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up onto the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that way, if he tries to run or do anything, I can futz with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! I'm going to run away from this guy that's next to me. I'm going to run out into the alley so I can see people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush out, it takes a swing attack of opportunity towards you. This is going to be with a club. It has a heavy wooden club and it makes a giant arc towards you as you speed away. That is 19 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use a reaction on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to say "I am rubber and you are glue" and use Hellish Rebuke on him. In Infernal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well, first, the club hits you and you take five points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around, you say that at him and unleash your Hellish Rebuke. He has to make a constitution saving throw, I believe it is, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe. Hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to save first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm applying my changes to my health.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now close out of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so much!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has to make a constitution save-- No, that's dexterity saving throw, which it does not make. It's seven. So it suffers 2d10 cold damage. So how much did you deal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, 2d10. Okay. Nine.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is becoming a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So sorry, guys. There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you dart away, you release your fury and anger, and you watch as suddenly this blast of cold water and ice energy burst out of its body. The inside of its somewhat cavernous ribcage is now filled with frost crystals, jutting out and breaking parts of the ribs. It looks heavily damaged, but still standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, chilly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You still have your action, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, and my bonus action!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So for my bonus action, I'm going to send my lollipop towards the giant guy and try to hit him. At the same time, I'm going to cast-- What am I going to cast? Radiant-- No, Guiding Bolt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With, you know, I'm going to do a little flourish, like pink energy comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make your spell attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 19 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's new dice, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I touched one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't touch these ones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why they rolled so shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six, eight, nine radiant.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's up with the nines? It's getting ridiculous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: CritRoleStats is going-- (clicking).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're losing subscribers in Europe right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's radiant damage, and then the Spiritual Weapon--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Guiding Bolt: the next attack against it has advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. Then the Spiritual Weapon will have advantage. Great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Halt den Mund!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. So that's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage for Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's my eight? Six plus three is nine!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is absurd, guys. This is absurd. All righty, does that end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to use the rest of my movement to run over and try to get behind this wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're from over there, that's (counting) 20, you have ten more feet. You can get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'll work. I was going to go to the brick wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the brick wall. You'll get up onto it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's considered rough terrain, so you technically can't get all the way on the other side. You climb up onto it. That finishes your turn. As you finish blasting with the Guiding Bolt, at the same time as it slams and sparkles you watch as the lollipop clubs down onto the back of its head. That ends your turn. Caleb, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I start moving back towards the same vantage point I had before and I see Jester above me, and I see a guy over there covered in ice, and I whip around and the diamond comes up and I go (sizzling) and I was about to make it acid, but there's ice everywhere so it's ice now. Chromatic Orb off to the big guy in the middle of town square, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make the attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It misses entirely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It spins and hits the ground. You watch as ice crawls up the side of the building. I will say it does manage to put out part of the fire that is currently burning the building.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did a good thing here. You did good today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You made lemonade. Way to make some lemonade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just got the participation trophy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I use the rest of my movement to press my back against the wall and go nein, nein, nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move out, where are you at now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still behind the same building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dart out and fire, and then back. All righty. That ends your turn. Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a little perspective here. The gnolls pushing away the cart, how many are there? And what are they--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're getting momentum as it's going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No obvious weak points on the cart or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. It will take your bonus action to do so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take out a wheel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to take my bonus action to do so? Then I will not look at the cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will move slower if we kill them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure it will, but I don't know if I could kill one in one shot. Instead I will, using my goblin feet claws, just dig in and I'm going to go upside down so I can see into where Beau is and shoot one of the ones next to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically you have two that you're in view of here, they both have three-quarters cover because of the nearby door and the angle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ones next to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh. Well, I got to hit them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one are you shooting? The skeletal one or the--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one that I hit before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that one. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is 17.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that hits, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 would hit if it didn't have three-quarters cover, which gives a plus five bonus to AC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, poopers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it's just the large part of the door frame in the way, there's Beau in the way, and there's a lot going on in that moment. As you go and fire it just zips past and slams into part of the now broken door that's coming off the hinges.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, I hate level three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to go pop back up to the top floor, and use my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get down low, but your hood and hair are now frizzed and poking out the side. That ends your turn, Nott. This one is going to rush forward, pursuing Jester. That one is going to attempt to continue to whale on Beau. That's going to be a 15 against Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses, you just duck out of the way as it tries to bite you and slam your elbow onto its snout, knocking it out of the way. Just holding on, holding off in this doorway. The one that runs up towards you is going to attempt to hit you again with a club. That is going to be a 19. Again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their turn. Top of the round, Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, okay. I'm going to taste a little bit of blood that's now in my mouth, get real fucking pissed off, and I'm going to do a Star Wars-style flourish and go crack down to the new guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skeletal one? There's a skeletal one, and there's the one that's been fighting you this whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one looks like he has less damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The skeletal one hasn't been damaged yet, but it looks a little more fragile. The one that got shot by Nott earlier still has the big--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do the skeletal guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Do the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not good at all. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Doesn't have as strong an armor class as the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. That one's already been damaged previously. As you bring the staff down with both hands, whack, you slam right through the center of its chest and clavicle. You watch as the torso breaks and folds from the weight of the blow. The skull tumbles off and hits the ground, and it falls into a pile of bones and rags.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action. With that momentum, I'm going to stick the staff in the ground, and use that to lift myself up and do a two-footer kick into the other guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Single attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so this is your third ki point?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, this is my second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, because you did the-- No, because you did flurry earlier, didn't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did, but I did it as an action, not on a bonus action, and you said I didn't have to use a ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, a Flurry of Blows, I thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did Patient Defense, I did one Flurry of Blows--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did the dodge action, as an action, which doesn't take any ki points. You spent one doing a Flurry of Blows earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I spent one doing deflect, and then one to do Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your third one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. This is the second one. This is the first Flurry of Blows I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, that's what I was asking, my confusion. Cool, so go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, I don't remember. This was what I rolled, right? Okay, not good. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten against him? Nope. As you kick both feet forward, one hits and skims off the shoulder. The other?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other is okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Pour some sugar on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage? All righty, based on the damage that you had sustained earlier and the blows from earlier, as you strike him with the other foot, you snap the side of his jaw, which breaks out. As he stumbles backward, you take the back of the staff and crack up underneath the jaw, snapping the neck the rest of the way, and it falls to the ground, no longer moving. You still have your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now I'm going to look around, and I'm going to step back and into the house for just a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into the house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is fine. Just so I have cover. Right in the doorway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just going to take a quick timeout.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quick timeout.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a really loud ticking clock in the room with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You hear a (faint scream) in the distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly's on the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I'm being an asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. Stands up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, I'm normally the one with shaky hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 20 and a natural one. The second one misses. You suffer eight points of piercing damage as the arrow sinks right into your torso, right in the stomach area, and pierces through. You catch it with your hand, but it's still a few inches into your actual midsection. Then there's the one over here that turned around and sees you now engaging with the current pack leader.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm a gnoll! Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just confused, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be six points of piercing damage. This one now slams into the side of your knee, and hits the meaty part, so thankfully it's not locked in the bone or any of the joint, but it hits you in the side and you buckle to that side from the pain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy over here is going to leap down and begin helping push the cart.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, the cart pushes another full 40 feet and is currently off of the board. Let me mark it over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we feel about the cart?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to get the cart!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can take a shot at the cart, but what is one arrow going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can take out people pushing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes the gnolls' turn there. Oh, there's the one that's attacking Molly. It's going to take its spear and attempt to two-hand strike at you. That is cocked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he have a spear? I thought he had a bow. Oh, he's got both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 to hit, which I don't think hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, on the wall, dance off the way, leap as it goes up. All right, and I believe that's all the gnolls immediately in the vicinity that are in combat. That ends the gnolls' turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, great, awesome, sweet. Can I use Eldritch Blast against the big fucking guy, because he didn't get any closer for a melee attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still within his attack range, because he has the glaive. You do have disadvantage on Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Imma fucking move out of his attack range. Does that give him attack of opportunity?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm doing that anyway. I'm going to move back towards the corner where I was going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, all the way back. Back towards my original hiding place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull back to the corner there. As you pull back, he takes a step forward and reaches out with the glaive to try and strike you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have any disadvantage or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be ten points of slashing damage. As you back away, arcs downward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will now, out of his melee range, Eldritch Blast. Ugh, God, that's not great. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does not hit. Now that it's seen the Blast, after it strikes and grins you hear this (hyena chuckle) under its breath. You turn around and go to strike out with the Eldritch Blast, and it pulls one of the other gnolls nearby and yanks it in front of him, just as the shield takes it off, then sets him back in place. Deflects it with its own guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. As I'm pulling around the corner, can I use my bonus action to drop the stupid, runty gnoll look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to spend a bonus action, you just drop it. Pulling back from the fire, yeah, you can get just around that corner. The guard lets you by.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. The leader at this point makes this loud gibbering sound that echoes throughout the alley, turns, and runs off to pursue the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He left!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're at level three, that's got to be an acceptable option right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means we almost killed him, that's what that means! We almost had him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we chase after him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends his turn. The guards now, who have notched their crossbows again, are going to take shots at both of those guys right there. Fucking two. That does hit. The other one gets hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have we killed any of the gnolls-gnolls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's simple numbers. Them leaving is a good--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking a slice at this guy again. I don't have advantage anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not. He is not prone anymore, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slice number two. That hits, thank you! 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 will hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's five points of damage and two points of extra damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Radiant? All right. The first one, you swing and it ducks out of the way, and attempts to strike upward with its spear. As you do, you knock it to the side, with the scimitar that missed, and with your other hand, strike down right across its face. You arc through and you actually carve one of the eyes in twain. You see a large red mark where you've split part of its face, and it's hurt really bad, but it's still standing. There's gore dripping out of the socket where its ruined eye sits. (snarls)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and circle around it to get out of the way of the archers. I'm going to hop back off and get behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that without a problem. You leapfrog off of him, grab his shoulders, and land behind him, scimitars at the ready. Okay, ending Molly's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the guards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards already went. Oh, she didn't fire. Sorry, thank you for reminding me about that. The other guards did go, she did not-- They did not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't they going to attack this skeleton one that's right here next to both of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They throw their crossbow to the ground and pull out a morningstar, and does a sideswipe towards this-- That is a 19. We'll say that straight up hits. That does five plus eight points of damage to that one. I don't think you've damaged that one yet, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes I had. I did the Hellish Rebuke to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, you did! That was the wrong one. All right, with that, they swing backwards with the mace and hit the side of the skeletal head, which shatters immediately upon impact, ruining its form, and is no longer part of the battle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am so surprised I fall off the wall!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are. You tumble that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get out of the city!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Jester, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Are either of those two gnolls over there damaged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell, nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, I'm going to use my giant lollipop, and it's going to swing and hit a couple times and try to hit one like a bat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, this is the one you licked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sad trombone)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam's spit: not a good luck charm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it swings in the air and spins, they both take one step back and it hits the dirt, and they both look at each other, and (chuckles).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself, and then I'm going to leap off the wall with great flourish and land next to Caleb. Okay, that's a good idea. I'm going to land next to the guard. Then I'm going to skip away to the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All righty. That ends Jester's turn. Caleb, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm just going to do my same dog and pony show trick, I'm going to go to the corner, I should be able to see two or three gnolls, I think, over there, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so (sizzling) starts to burn in my hand, Chromatic Orb out to hit whichever one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one's probably the easiest to see right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. Oh, that's good. That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're welcome, boo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 3d8, so where is my eight-sided die? There it is. This is fire, and it is 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's injured, but it's standing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I inch back again and say, (singing) If it ain't broke, don't fix it. And hide behind the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's two gnolls in front of me that I can see, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see those down there. The one just got blasted with the familiar fiery explosion of Caleb's Chromatic Orb. The other is untouched.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other one, I will point at and I will remove a tiny rotten tart from my pocket and crumple it onto the floor and take a feather and move it around over the crumbs, and say: Hey, what happens to a frog's wagon when it breaks down? It gets toad away! And I will cast Hideous Laughter on the gnoll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hideous indeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No bad Halle Berry lines.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: What happens to a toad when it's struck by lightning? The same thing that happens to everything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like the theory that he doesn't burst into laughter, he just holds the groan pain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to think that he does laugh hideously and despises himself for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you shoot the one who was blasted with the fire or the one that was untouched?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The untouched one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the one that was currently untouched that was drawing another arrow glances up and hears, and goes, (uncontrollable laughter) and falls to the ground. (manic laughter) Laughing this horrible hyena chuckle, and it's billowing out into the street, clutching its stomach and dropping its weapons to the side and just rolling on the ground. Its friend next to it is like, huh? Looks up and sees you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, I'll use my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I have to stealth. Oh, God damn. Okay, that's 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I step out of the burning building, sauntering like a badass John Woo film.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doves go everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's five feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pointing at the guy on the ground. As soon as he turns, I go whack like a baseball bat, right across his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as he glances over to the side, he looks back just as you're already in his face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Swing it high, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25! No, sorry, 24!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, that'll definitely hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Swing away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take that, that's a 13, sorry, ten, nope, 11! Math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. Whack! You watch as about five or six gnoll teeth go flying from the impact, the jaw quivers as spittle and blood goes careening off the side of the impact. It falls and stumbles, if you want to follow it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to, using that momentum, do a helicopter flourish above and go crack down over top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait, this is technically an off-handed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it's a d4 for this one, but we're using the staff for a flourish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's a four, so eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. Wham! As you bring it down over the top of the head, it falls and gets up, it's dazed and beaten within an inch of its life, it's ready to go. It's barely standing at this point, one eye is lolling around and trying to find, and the other one is swollen shut now and can't actually see anything. It's in a bad place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. I'll hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your turn, Beau. The guy on the ground is just laughing his ass off. At the end of its turn, it's going to try and make a saving throw. No, that is a two. It is still laughing on the ground. This one, seeing the rest of its allies run, turns around and is just going to run.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the one you just hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. This here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are over there? Oh, I didn't see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two, and I've got one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one, seeing another one flee, is going to attempt to try and flee after. You get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have advantage on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Oh, but that's still good. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that with my regular attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock and crush him to the floor. As he tries to run, you whack and hit him, and you watch him take a few steps and skid and fall onto the ground, and he's not moving. The one over here, who is not currently in the process of knowing that everyone else is fleeing, because he's been stuck over here, is going to try to take a spear attack at you, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to snap at him. I'm going to use Blood Maledict.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hellish Snap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is good, because he rolled a natural 20 on the first roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no he ain't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage, that brings him to a 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it just hits you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But at least it's not a critical attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All his friends are running away, and he's going, "Me and my friends are going to kill you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of piercing damage. Its eyes go dark and it pulls back, and still it seems its sense of smell can still find your placement in the vicinity, and as you pull out of the way, it still manages to find you. The spear pierces right around where the hip is, and you pull back, gritting your teeth. That's going to end its go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I hop around the corner again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (engine revving) Start up the full.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go ahead and use my 30 speed to close in on the proned-out. Great, and I'll use Eldritch Blast against that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it has disadvantage against it because it's prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. As it's rolling around on the ground, it's difficult to find a proper shot, and you fire, and it hits the dirt next to it, sending a bit of dust over it. It stops laughing for a second as the dust-- He laughs even harder at the actual dust.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. All right. The guards go. The leader continues to run, and is now disappearing into the smoke and ash. You don't have a visual on the cart at the moment, it's now pressed into where a lot of the fire is, and it's obscuring their escape. These guards are going to move forward as they load their crossbows, and they're both-- actually, because he's on the ground laughing, you're coming out on the roof, they're going to turn and fire at the one that's in front of Molly. It does have three-quarters cover because of the wall. They're trying to help you out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need the assistance of guards, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits the wall and deflects.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit! That is a 21, actually, so that does, even with the bonus to armor class from the three-quarters cover, it still hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those guards are killing more than we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its jaw goes slack and falls to the ground, dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you want to ask that nameless guard how he wants to do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's still one left on the ground, which we'll say for the purposes of narrative here, who wants to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, you really want to do something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it our turn soon? Caleb and me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, when we come back around, it would be Molly's turn, Jester, then Caleb and Nott. So whatever you guys want to do in this moment before it comes back, let me know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to jump down from the wall and run as fast as I can after the leader and the cart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, disadvantage. Jesus. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You jump off the side and you land, you do suffer four points of bludgeoning damage as you hit the ground and your feet buckle, and you actually slam and your face hits the dirt, but you use your momentum to scurry back up, and beginning to move forward, you get-- and if you're using the rest of your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dash, everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a concentration check, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw, because you did take--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a saving throw, that's not disadvantage. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you maintain control over the Hideous Laughter. Okay. You rush into the cloud of ash after them, and you begin to see some of the shapes ahead of you of the gnolls there, pushing the cart. You're still behind them by about 30 or so feet, and right as you rush forward, darting in, the heat from the embers entering your lungs burn, and you put your mask over to block and help filter a bit, with the cloth and bandages, and right as you rush forward, you see the back of the heavy armored leader, that's bringing up the rear of where the cart is, and he turns and sees you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you finish your movement, it spins and looks in your vicinity, to see that you're alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes his glaive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And closes the distance with a giant downward swing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, is it his turn already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point? The narrative timing on this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I was going to run that way too, I thought we were still--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, who was allowed to run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Nott's after you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. So I will--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we didn't get to go, because Nott just jumped it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. All right, well let's roll it back a little bit here and see how this helps you. All right, cool. So. No, it's fine. So Jester, Molly, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to run to see where the cart was going. Full dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you sprint off, with a full dash, you don't quite get as close as Nott does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I wouldn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because Nott is much faster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he triggering my spider sense at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your spider sense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not really a spider sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, but you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's a spider sense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Basically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about that far back, I would say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to have my duplicate go over and touch the guy laughing on the ground, and cast Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a melee spell attack, correct? You have advantage on it because he's currently incapacitated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If he's still around when she's done, I would have done my same single--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll be all the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god. So roll the dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to turn into powder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five, six, 13, 26!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's laughing, your image walks up with a skip, bends down and touches him, and he suddenly withers into this completely dried-out husk of what the gnoll once was, the life force drawn and cast out of his body. He stops laughing, and the body falls like a mummy to the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your duplicate can cast spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. That's why it's more fun if I can move her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why it's like a bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, finishing those turns, back to the top of the round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I would have leaned out, if I had seen it was dead, and no enemies, I would use my movement, my action to move further up to the corner, not much besides that, but join where Fjord and the duplicate are. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your friend took off running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all happening right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is simultaneous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hearing you say that, I'm going to be like, I guess we're-- race you! I'm going to take off running after Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 40 feet speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to catch up right around basically where Molly is there. Do you have a ki point left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to use your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would just get me-- I'll save it for right now. But I can see Nott, and I can see the guy, and I can see the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's cloud and ash, embers pushing into the atmosphere now, the nearby building are actually in flames and engulfed on the side here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a double move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a double movement to get to there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you and Molly are 15, 20 feet from each other, and ahead you can see the shape of Nott, and you can see the leader of them. You can now see from nearby buildings that about ten other gnolls are all gathering around the cart and they're all leaving. They're all carrying giant sacks on their back, dragging bodies and corpses behind them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This wasn't the only gnolls that attacked the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was just our little patch. Our gnoll patch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About six more of them begin stepping up, flanking the leader, who's now staring at the three of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now's not the time!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run forward using my 30 feet but I will call out: Nott, get back here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Don't blow my cover.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let them go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's turn. The leader sees the three of you there, puts the glaive away with one hand, turns around as he draws his longbow and fires an arrow right at you. That is a 17 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is so down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 18 plus three. 21 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got to be fucking kidding me, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a nine on a d10. And it's a crit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly goes down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With his movement, he puts the bow back away and keeps walking with the rest of the gnolls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let them go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as all of them turn around and they all begin to gather. You hear this cacophony of different gibbering cries in the distance as they're all starting to call themselves back to leave the city. They all step into the clouds of smoke and ash in the distance before eventually all the shapes disappear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to watch them as far as I can to try and pinpoint a direction that they're heading in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a survival check in this moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's dark, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is dark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those who are both on the ground as Beau continues doing this, you guys begin to rush up and you see both Molly and Nott on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run up and I'll cast Cure Wounds on Molly. Then I'm going to run over and do the same thing at level two to Nott. That's six points of healing for you, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll run up and cast it on Nott. Oh no, Nott! I pull her up into my lap. Oh, that's good. 13-- oh, 13 plus five! No, plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That immediate first breath is filled with pain, both from the wounds you've sustained and the immediate influx of burning ash that sweeps into your lungs. Both of you come to consciousness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping) Oh my gods!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What were you thinking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was just going to follow them from afar. I forgot they had bows and arrows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's literally the only thing that's been happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought they wouldn't see me because of the smoke. Oh boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put out these fires. Oh, I'm not getting up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah shit, the town, you guys! And I'm going to go back and start trying to put out the fires.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to crawl back towards the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our friends at Wyrmwood actually have a pretty cool giveaway tonight. As part of their new Kickstarter, they have this all-inclusive package here, which is both a dice box, with a leather base, and on the inside here an all-inclusive package for your dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, with some of the flames dying down, 30 minutes or so of the chaos descending, the Crownsguard begin to come back, those that are still living, many of them wounded and tending to their wounds, or helping the survivors that are still within the town. You see some families are starting to unblock their entranceways and the people who had escaped the city are slowly beginning to filter in. You can hear the sobbing in the distance of families that are coming back to homes that have been destroyed. The smoke still chokes the air, and at this hour now it's probably pushing close to 11:00 or later. But as the guards come through and begin to take in the essence of what's happening, the armored individual that helped you when you first arrived and gave you the command to aid in this approaches. You see their half-elven face, solemn and tense, approach and extend a hand. "There aren't many who would immediately "jump into the fray as you did. I would say that we would have lost many more, and perhaps all of my "men had you not been there, so thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, I say as I cut off the ears of some of the gnolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You beat me to it. You said 30 minutes went by, I wanted us to be doing that already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're like: Oh no, put out this fire!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These people have lost everything!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just waiting for you to pause.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no worries. Unfortunately, for the three skeletal ones you only manage to get one full ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay because we got two ears off of all the other ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. We'll say for that, for those who would've been destroyed or damaged, let me go ahead and roll and see how many ears you're able to pull off of those bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm also going pull off a chunk of tail and see if it will pass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to think that we leaned down to the same gnoll, cutting, and went, same hat? Same hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to pull up about 12 ears intact between all the fallen bodies. Some you killed, some maybe you didn't. You came across the body elsewhere in the square and just took the ear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I totally remember kicking this guy's ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other guards are collecting them as they go and there are a couple moments where someone was going for an orc-- or a gnoll that you had killed and you went to the guard and went, nuh-uh, and they backed off. But anyway, the soldier head that was speaking with you extends a hand and they say, "I "am Watchmaster Bryce Feelid, assigned here to Alfield, now in my fourth year. Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watchmaster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Watchmaster Bryce Feelid."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What were those creatures? Have you encountered them before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've encountered them before, yes, in smaller hunting packs, maybe a half-dozen at a "time, usually on the outskirts. They don't come to civilization like this. It's generally too "dangerous for them, in the smaller numbers they travel. What the fuck are they after?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Such a grizzly scene, they seemed to be carrying away bodies on that cart they had.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you notice they had some undead gnolls with them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There were.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever seen anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've maybe crossed one or two as part of the roving packs, it's not terribly uncommon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What turns them like that? Is there something in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea. I don't know the ins and outs of their creepy bestial lifestyle. I mean, "what--" And you watch as they sit down for a second, leaning against the wall, thinking and scratching at their chin, "Word came of a small hunting party of these beasts spotted to the "south, so we sent a small troupe to slay them naught but two hours before they struck here. We had sent "more than half of our men's strength to go and deal with them, so we were unprepared and, at the "time, unguarded for the most part. We were caught at half strength. It can't be a coincidence. They "must be desperate to assault head-on like this. There's plenty of small game in the "surrounding wood and they're known to be provoked to violence, but I've only heard of gnolls picking "off the outlying folk, those that wander too far from the fields."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they eat the bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They eat what flesh they can get a hold of, but we went through a number of the buildings and "they've ransacked two of the inns. They completely took the entire butcher's stock. They've carved "the city of whatever meats, fresh or dried, we had."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Word came? Word came that they were in the south? Where did word come from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Word came from some of our crownsguard who were running a patrol."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have seen these things as far south as Trostenwald. Further even.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has there been something else going on, that you can think of, that might have cut off their food supply?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not that I can think of. For the most part, this far south, other than a few run-ins here and "there, they aren't-- conflicts of this size don't make it past Bladegarden."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bladegarden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a lot of meat that they've acquired from "us, and they've lost many, I thought, of their kin in this battle as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too much meat. What are they feeding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Or what's making them so hungry?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Or that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've fended them off for now, but they'll come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Especially if they're as desperate as you say they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have to do our best to at least recover any survivors, wipe out what remains, and prevent this "from ever happening again."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you heard local farmers complaining about them stealing livestock? Missing livestock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to look into that, actually. I'm sorry, I'm still gathering my thoughts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) W.C! I get up and I run and see if our horse is still there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, W.C.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you charge out to the far city and you do find W.C., still affixed to the cart, currently chewing on a small bag of oats where one of the families of villagers who fled have come back and begun to feed him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, man! Thumbs up to the family, I'll run back to the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to run back to the group, or bring W.C. with?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm going to leave it out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, cool, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Petting zoo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they're petting him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the rest of you, Bryce says, "Well, as rash as it was said-- and our coffers are not as "strong as they could be, I will request more of a monetary influx up north-- for the ears you have "taken you will be paid. Any more that you find, those will be paid as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, and we're going to need some lodging anyway, so perhaps some trade could be worked out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed, we could provide some extra muscle, perhaps for some lodging while we stay and maybe we could aid your men and their efforts to exterminate this foe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I would normally put you up in the Candleglow Inn but--" They gesture over towards the large building that you had walked through that's now currently--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's literally glowing like a candle right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is ironic now that you point it out."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel really bad for saying that out loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's just not let Thadeus know that his life is--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question. After listening to this for a while, I start looking around the town, would you say that with all these burnt buildings everywhere, that if I start picking through the rubble I would find enough charcoal to reduce the costs I would need for Find Familiar, eventually? Because I still need the incense and the herbs, but if I get a lot of charcoal from these burnt homes--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say if you take 30 minutes to find good pieces of charcoal, and roll an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, done and done. That's good, and I have a good investigation too. That is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you manage to reduce the cost of you next Find Familiar spell by three gold pieces.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the hopes and dreams of Alfield. So Bryce looks at you. "I can have you put up at the "Feed and Mead tavern."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feed and Mead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Feed and Mead tavern. It's not the most comfortable place, but it'll do."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not name it, but pass it on to Crute, the owner."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell him that Bryce sent you and you are being put up by the Crown for as long as you are "hunting these creatures."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We appreciate that. Hopefully, there won't be another call to action while they're here, but you can count on us if there is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Well." They reach into a pouch and begin to count out the gold for the number of ears you've collected. With twelve ears--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 360 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After bringing the ears forward, they glance over. "Actually, I'll be right back. I may need to "acquire a bit more change." And after a brief wait, Bryce returns and you are paid the full amount.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 360 gold at your disposal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we divvy it up equally?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm fine with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bryce says, "We hope to hear back in the morning of our scouts' findings. If you wish to, "if you can hunt whatever remains of these creatures and bring back proof that they've been "wiped out, I'll see what I can have sent southward of Zadash to make it worth your while."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the meantime, you wouldn't have anything that might help us and our little expedition, would you? Healing potion might be nice if you got one hiding away somewhere in a closet, forgotten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't mean to be brusque, but at the moment I think we have a number of our guard who "are in more desperate need."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure that would be appreciated. For the moment, you all look about as battered as I feel. Rest "up, come--" Let's see, they would be at-- "Meet me outside of the Broad Barn."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The "Rod Bawn"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Broad Barn."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The broad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They point it out to you, it's on the western side of the town. "There, we'll make sure "you get the basic supplies necessary. Hopefully, we'll have information on where to go, and if you "so choose, we could conscribe you to be under our intent to destroy these creatures. Think on it, "rest, we'll speak in the morning." Bryce turns around and limps off with a few of the other crownsguard. As you guys eventually find your way to the Feed and Mead, you are immediately met by Crute, who is this ornery, salty-looking dwarf of tousled white-gray hair, this single tuft of a beard that dangles down towards the belly button before it hits a ring of gold, goes, "Oh, so I've "been told you're the ones who were coming to sleep. Got one of our two rooms for you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking at your shoulder, or right above your face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's got two glass eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come, I'll show you." Turns around and leads you to your space. There are four beds jammed in here. It's like a youth hostel-type living situation here, but it's functional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they doubles? Fulls? Queens? Twins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are pretty much as twin bed as you can get.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine with the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm great with a bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've already got the silver thread out and I am looping it over any open window and by the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was there beer downstairs? Was there ale?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to drop my things and run downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You come downstairs and there's nobody inside, this is not a tavern night for a lot of people. "Right, can I help you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there drink? Is there smoke?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Smoke we don't have. But drink, that I can give you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take something interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting, you say. Heh." Takes out a bottle, looks like a deep green glass, and uncorks it. Takes a small shot glass that has a bulbous bottom, pours it to the very top with this liquid that looks a deep sea-teal green, and slides it forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fast or slow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, depends on how much you like to dream."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For that, and for what I heard you did, it's on the house."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nonsense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the night. You want more, you're paying top-shelf price."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's top-shelf price?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For that drink there, that would run you about three silver."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put a gold on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not going to complain."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Consider it an advance, it's been a rough night for everybody."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, right, of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to sip this mother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a very smoky, oak-barrel flavor to it at first as it hits your tongue and then it burns into this very medicinal, herbal, almost anise mixed with burnt charcoal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds nice. I'm going to sit, and sip this, and grin, and very silently have a mild nervous breakdown about what just went down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you all slowly come to rest, exhausted, sore, beaten, trying to fall asleep to the distant muffled sound of shouts and wailing in the streets--

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: And Jester jumping on the bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself to rest, preparing for what the morning may hold, and that's where we're going to pick up for next week's session.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Worst roommate ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not the only one. Caleb is going: one gold, two gold, three gold, 60 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 60 gold, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This was a good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is working out weirdly, I'm excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all have an extra 60 gold, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was some Jackie Chan shit. You were in the doorway, dodging everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We now need to have a Stephen Chow night, that was some crazy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She just shot some Sun Chip out of her mouth. You're welcome, internet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gif that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, there it is, I found it.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (groan)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you all for joining us tonight, we'll see you next week, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good night, everybody.
